config.siddhiApp: @App:name('APIMTopSubscribersSiddhi') @primaryKey('SUBSCRIPTION_ID') @store(type="rdbms" , datasource="AM_DB") define table AM_SUBSCRIPTION(SUBSCRIPTION_ID int,TIER_ID string,API_ID int,LAST_ACCESSED string,APPLICATION_ID int,SUB_STATUS string,SUBS_CREATE_STATE string,CREATED_BY string,CREATED_TIME string,UPDATED_BY string,UPDATED_TIME string,UUID string);

queryData.query: from AM_SUBSCRIPTION select CREATED_BY,count(SUBSCRIPTION_ID) AS count group by CREATED_BY order by count desc limit {{limit}};
